TopicTitle: How can i run ksp on my cpu faster

Articles.Content:
I have a really crappy computer and i can hardly run ksp on it all my settings are on low and it still lags massivle (sorry for misspelling im not a good speller )

P.S Another problem i have is that it crashes my cpu like hitting the power button

p.s.s i dont know my cpu specs i've had it like 3 years PLZ HELP
There's really nothing you can do with out getting a new CPU. From what I've read KSP is very CPU intensive due to the game development platform used.
